summary: This Mod retextures the Item \"Bloodstone Chalice\" of the Dawnguard DLC. Available in 2 new versions (1024x1024 pixel)
descriptionHtml:
This Mod retextures the Item \"Bloostone Chalice\" of the Dawnguard DLC.

Available in 2 lore-friendly versions:

- dark steel (1024x1024)
- bronze (1024x1024)

Although it is only a small modification I hope you like it.

[b][u]REQUIREMENT:[/b][/u]

- Dawnguard DLC

[b][u]INSTALLATION:[/b][/u]

Copy the files into your Skyrim data folder or use NMM for installation.

[b][u]UNINSTALLATION:[/b][/u]

Simply delete the files from your Skyrim data folder or uncheck this mod on NMM.

[b][u]My other Mods:[/b][/u]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34060/?]Improved Dawnguard Vampire Eyes - glowing and non-glowing[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34460/?]Dawnguard Vampire Dog Retexture[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/39765/?]Tutorial - How to create vampires with non-ungly faces in a simple way[/url]
author: ViewtifulFlo
